badge_template_activities.title: Certified Challenger Advisors must have an average of 15+ years of leadership experience and 10+ years of professional facilitation experience. Individuals who have earned this badge have passed a rigorous audition and completed a facilitation bootcamp.
Individuals must complete 6-12 months of classroom training and "practice" facilitation

To maintain certification, Certified Challenger Advisors participate in regular upskilling through a community of practice with their peers at Challenger and undergo bi-annual performance evaluation reviews.
